resources.string:
Benefits of Plank 
1) Helps improve your posture. 
2) Helps develop a strong and stable core.
3)Reduces the risk of lower back pain.

Benefits of Lunges 
1) Helps improve your posture. 
2) Helps develop a strong and stable core.
3)Reduces the risk of lower back pain.

Benefits of Stepping 
1) Helps improve your posture. 
2) Helps develop a strong and stable core.
3)Reduces the risk of lower back pain.

Benefits of Crunches 
1) Helps improve your posture. 
2) Helps develop a strong and stable core.
3)Reduces the risk of lower back pain.

Benefits of Push ups 
1) Helps improve your posture. 
2) Helps develop a strong and stable core.
3)Reduces the risk of lower back pain.
